Class ReaderManager

java.lang.Object
com.uk.tsl.rfid.asciiprotocol.device.ReaderManager
public class ReaderManager extends Object
A class that manages a collection of Reader

  • Method Details

    • willAutoConnectUsbReaders

      public boolean willAutoConnectUsbReaders()
      Returns:
      true if the ReaderManager will automatically connect to any USB Reader connections

    • setWillAutoConnectUsbReaders

      public void setWillAutoConnectUsbReaders(boolean willAutoConnect)
      Set to true to allow the ReaderManager to automatically connect to any USB Reader connections

    • create

      public static void create(android.content.Context context)
      Create the shared instance of the ReaderManager Does nothing if instance already exists This enables support for Bluetooth-connected and USB-connected readers
      Parameters:
      context - the ApplicationContext for the ReaderManager

    • sharedInstance

      public static ReaderManager sharedInstance()
      Returns:
      the shared ReaderManager for the application or null if none

    • isBluetoothSupportEnabled

      public boolean isBluetoothSupportEnabled()
      Returns:
      true if the ReaderManager will support Bluetooth devices

    • setBluetoothSupportEnabled

      public void setBluetoothSupportEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Parameters:
      enabled - set true if the ReaderManager should support Bluetooth devices

    • isUsbSupportEnabled

      public boolean isUsbSupportEnabled()
      Returns:
      true if the ReaderManager will support USB devices

    • setUsbSupportEnabled

      public void setUsbSupportEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Parameters:
      enabled - set true if the ReaderManager should support Bluetooth devices

      public void clearPersistedData()
      Clears the ReaderManager's persisted data Such as the mapping between a Reader and its Bluetooth and USB transports

    • readerWithTransport

      public Reader readerWithTransport(TransportType type, String id)
      Query list for a particular Reader Returns
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the transport
      id - the transport id
      Returns:
      the Reader that has a transport with the given parameters otherwise null
